Pre-Game Insights: Pacers have gone 11-14 against Eastern Conference teams.
Haliburton is averaging 18.4 points and 8.8 assists for the Pacers.
Coby White is shooting 43.2% and averaging 18.5 points for the Bulls.
The Pacers' 12.8 made 3-pointers per game this season are only 0.7 fewer made shots on average than the 13.5 per game the Bulls give up.
The Bulls are 3-5 in division play.
The Pacers are ninth in the league with 28.0 assists per game.
